The video was originally posted on Twitt: 2019 and has been viewed over 2.6 million times.
The caption of the post claims that a 40: ton truck was lifted by 2,000 drones.
The same video with the identical claim: 4. The claim is proven to be false as the video actually shows computer-generated imagery (CGI) used in an advertisement for Scania, a Swedish manufacturer of commercial vehicles.
